Episodes.Title: When Push Comes to Shove (2)
Episodes.Plot: While Capt. Push lingers between life and death, Allison struggles to decipher confusing messages from the other side in an attempt to stop a serial killer before he claims his next victim.
Episodes.GuestStars: Arliss Howard, Jessica Stier, Saida Pagan, Zack Duhame, Marco Antonio Martinez, Florence Regina, Andi Eystad, Ryan De Quintal, Daniel Bess, Suzanne Santo, Lawrence Pressman, Anna Shemeikka, Johnny Pacar

Episodes.Title: The Song Remains The Same
Episodes.Plot: All outside noise is drowned out as a popular song is continuously played very loud, and only in Allison's head.  The song gives Allison clues to the whereabouts of a missing coed.
Episodes.GuestStars: Oriana Oppice, Beth Anne Garrison, Carlos Lacamara, David Barrera

Episodes.Title: Time Out of Mind
Episodes.Plot: Allison dreams that she's a woman who's been committed to a mental institution in 1959.  After viewing taped sessions from the clinic, Allison discovers that the woman from her dream had made claims of being Allison DuBois, living in 2005.
Episodes.GuestStars: Carson Elrod, Oriana Oppice, Rami Malek, Bonnie Urseth, Derick Alexander, Ronald William Lawrence, Sam Anderson, Tim Conlon, Natasha Gregson Wagner, Barbara Tarbuck, Chloe Webb, Steven M. Gagnon, Loren Lazerine

Episodes.Title: Light Sleeper
Episodes.Plot: Allison's recent habit of sleepwalking keeps landing her in dangerous situations.  This leaves her exhausted while she hurries to solve a kidnapping case before it's too late.
Episodes.GuestStars: Seth T. Walker, James Frain, Alicia Coppola, Logan Parker Grove, Treva Etienne, Michael Kopelow, Laurel Marlantes, Anjul Nigam, Ryan Carlberg, Ron Perkins, Holliston Coleman, Greg Cahill

Episodes.Title: Sweet Dreams
Episodes.Plot: Allison is having dreams about an old high school friend and decides to find her. Meanwhile a man seeks the district attorney's help in finding his daughter who has been missing for a week.
Episodes.GuestStars: Aleksa Palladino, Jessy Schram, John Getz, Saida Pagan, Yvette Cruise, Del Monroe, Ciro Suarez, Kendahl King, Vicki Davis, Sarah Hagan, Emily Stone

Episodes.Title: Dead Aim
Episodes.Plot: Allison helps the district attorney put away a murderer whose lawyer is also using a psychic....
Episodes.GuestStars: Troy Cephers, Mary Strong, Jorge-Luis Pallo, Reena Dutt, Peggy Dunne, Alan Woolf, Sarah Lilly, Kendahl King, Jeanette Brox, Harry Groener, Eric Pierpoint, Troy Blendell, Dempsey Pappion, Hayes MacArthur, Hari Dhil

Episodes.Title: Judge, Jury & Executioner
Episodes.Plot: Joe serves his jury duty on a case against a man accused of murdering his rich wife. Allison starts having visions about the man but D.A. Devalos orders her not to work on the case because of a conflict of interests.
Episodes.GuestStars: John Wesley, Ronny Cox, Kamala López-Dawson, John Rubens, John Harnagel, Emiliano Torres, James Patrick Stuart, Octavia Spencer, Elena Fabri, James Callahan, Jan Hoag, Bellamy Young

Episodes.Title: Too Close to Call
Episodes.Plot: Allison has a vision that could jeopardize D.A. Devalos' chances for re-election. Meanwhile, Joe runs into an ex-girlfriend from college.
Episodes.GuestStars: Kyle Bornheimer, Annabelle Milne, Monnae Michaell, Walker Howard, Perrey Reeves, Brian Kerwin, Jeff Campbell

Episodes.Title: Still Life
Episodes.Plot: Allison is lead to an art gallery where she encounters the art of a popular artist. While looking at some of his paintings, 3-dimensional images emerge that make her believe that the artist is somehow involved in a crime. Joe gets a job offer from a former co-worker. This episode is partly in 3-D.
Episodes.GuestStars: John Shea, Michael Cavanaugh, Bruce Gray, Mark Silverman, Kevin Alejandro, Susan Santiago, Harry Groener

Episodes.Title: The Reckoning
Episodes.Plot: Allison dreams about hitting a girl with her car and a woman who's house is haunted. She finds out that the woman killed herself. Now Allison is trying to put all the pieces together.
Episodes.GuestStars: Keith Oney, Paige Hurd, Cortney Keim, Lawrence Monoson, Suki Kaiser, Amanda Thorp, Katie Cecil, Holliston Coleman

Episodes.Title: Method to his Madness
Episodes.Plot: Allison can't get a psychotic murderer out of her head which makes Joe worry about his daughters' well-being.
Episodes.GuestStars: Cheyenne Wilbur, Benjamin Mouton, Rachael C. Smith, Jenny Mollen, Lisa Jay, Elizabeth Hendrickson, Sydney Walsh

Episodes.Title: Doctor's Order's
Episodes.Plot: The spirit of the doctor from episode 1-15 is back and after Allison's daughter Ariel.
Episodes.GuestStars: Heather Avery Clyde, Di Quon, Holliston Coleman, Norma Micheals, Felice Heather Monteith, Ian Barford, Mark A. Sheppard, Reiley McClendon, James Eckhouse, Gina Marie Fields, Dyllan Christopher, Moira Price

Episodes.Title: Raising Cain
Episodes.Plot: Allison helps with the location of a missing child. Afterwards she gets a vision about the child's future and is not sure anymore what she should do to help the child.
Episodes.GuestStars: Joseph Buttler, Andrew Caldwell, Nathan Wesdell, Taylor Nichols, Katy Selverstone, Jake Richardson

Episodes.Title: A Changed Man
Episodes.Plot: Allison gets a minor concussion when slipping in the bathtub. When she goes to get an MRI she has a strange vision about a man she just met.
Episodes.GuestStars: Jaime Ray Newman, M. J. Kang, Richmond Arquette, McKenna Palmer, Channing Nichols, Haynes Brooke

Episodes.Title: Sweet Child O' Mine
Episodes.Plot: Allison has problems with staying impartial about a case when she develops maternal feelings for a teenage boy who is accused of killing his former boss. Bridget finds a stray dog and want's to keep it.
Episodes.GuestStars: Gina Hecht, Adam Kulbersh, Jeff Sugarman, Suzanne Davis, David Haydn-Jones, Noel Fisher

Episodes.Title: Allison Wonderland
Episodes.Plot: Allisons helps the District Attorney trying to find a missing brother of a close friend. She becomes paranoid about antiterrorist agents from the government. Joe gets uneasy when he suspects that Bridget might be communicating with a dead author.
Episodes.GuestStars: David Carradine, Fredric Lehne, Michaela Watkins, Rebecca Gayheart, Madison Mason

Episodes.Title: Lucky in Love
Episodes.Plot: Allison dreams that her brother was involved in a local bank robbery. Her suspicions grow when he unexpectedly shows up in town and gets involved with a con woman.
Episodes.GuestStars: Tom Harper, Paula Fullerton, Bunnie Rivera, Jayden Lund, Ryan Hurst, Salvator Xuereb, Rachel Miner

Episodes.Title: S.O.S.
Episodes.Plot: Allison investigates apparently random killings, endangering her family in the process. Bridget has to do a class presentation about her mom's job.
Episodes.GuestStars: Helena Barrett, Elizabeth Penn Payne, Mary Strong, Amber Barretto, Jim Holmes, Tania Raymonde

Episodes.Title: Knowing Her
Episodes.Plot: Three girls are found murdered. Allison's visions connect Det. Scanlon with the case.
Episodes.GuestStars: Alejandro Patino, Michael Klock, Jay Huguley, Lauren Velez, Matt Winston

Episodes.Title: The Darkness is Light Enough
Episodes.Plot: Allison repeatedly dreams about a woman who is being watched by a stranger in her bedroom.
Episodes.Writer: Ken Kelsch, Nicolas Wauters, Analisa Brouet
Episodes.GuestStars: Randy Oglesby, Michael Klock, Molly Ringwald, Wayne Grace, Jamison Yang, Rachel Vacca, Tahmus Rounds

Episodes.Title: Death Takes a Policy
Episodes.Plot: Allison is busy investigating the death of a local doctor when a man claiming to be "Death" begins appearing in her visions, causing her to worry that maybe her time on this world is nearly over.
Episodes.GuestStars: Kelsey Grammer, Michael Robert Brandon, Lesley Boone, Yareli Arizmendi

Episodes.Title: Twice Upon A Time
Episodes.Plot: Allison dreams of the life she could have had if she'd become the attorney she originally wanted to be.
Episodes.GuestStars: Christina Souza, Moira Price, David Jahn, David James Elliott, Peter Wingfield, Ellen Geer, Darlena Tejeiro
